Schedule of Topics

This schedule is tentative, and is subject to change. Please check back regularly for updates!

Last Updated: Wednesday, March 8, 2023

As a reminder: Monday sections are Discussion Sections and Wednesday sections are Lab Sections. There will not be a discussion section in week 1 (as, if there were one, it would take place before the first lecture!)


Week Lectures Discussion Worksheet Lab

1

(4/03 - 4/09)

  • 00: Introduction

  • 01: Descriptive Statistics

  • 02: More Descriptive Statistics

 No Discussion Section Lab 01
(Introduction to Python, and Basic Data Types)

2

(4/10 - 4/16)

  • 03: Intro to Probability/Counting

  • 04: More Counting

 Discussion Worksheet 01 Lab 02: More Data Types; Logicals and Conditionals

3

(4/17 - 4/23)

  • 05: Probability Rules

  • 06: Review

 Discussion Worksheet 02 Lab 03: Functions and Loops

4

(4/24 - 4/30)

  • 07: Midterm Exam 1

  • 08: Discrete Random Variables

 Discussion Worksheet 03 (Midterm 1 Review) Lab 04: Basics of Plotting

5

(5/01 - 5/07)

  • 09: Continuous Random Variables

  • 10: Intro to Inferential Statistics

 Discussion Worksheet 04 Lab 05: Simulations and Sampling

6

(5/08 - 5/14)

  • 11: Sampling Distributions

  • 12: Confidence Intervals

 Discussion Worksheet 05 Lab 06: Sampling Distributions

7

(5/15 - 5/21)

  • 13: Hypothesis Testing

  • 14: Review

 Discussion Worksheet 06 Lab 07: Confidence Intervals

8

(5/22 - 5/28)

  • 15: Midterm Exam 2

  • 16: More Hypothesis Testing

 Discussion Worksheet 07 (Midterm 2 Review) Lab 08: Testing Distributional Fits

9

(5/29 - 6/4)

  • 17: Hypothesis Testing in Multiple Samples

  • 18: Regression

 Discussion Worksheet 08 Lab 09: Reading In Data, EDA, and Drawing Conclusions

10

(6/05 - 6/11)

  • 19: More Regression

  • 20: Review

 Discussion Worksheet 09 Lab 10: Regression
FINAL EXAM Tuesday, June 13 from 4-7pm
